message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this great product for the price of $18,000. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Alice, $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but my budget is closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to come down to $11,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $15,000 is still a bit high for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $12,500?
